revised_title: Inquiry into the Measure of Force of Bodies in Motion and Experimentum Crucis to Settle the Controversy
tldr: The author, James Jurin, examines the controversy surrounding the measure of force in moving bodies and proposes an experiment to resolve the disagreement between Leibniz and his followers, who argue that the measure of force is the product of weight and velocity, and those who believe it is the product of weight and the square of velocity.
